fields.description:
Using YARN CLI, when the user types "yarn applicationattempt", the help message for the "applicationattempt" command is shown. 

Here, the following line has a spelling mistake. "application" is misspelled as "aplication":

-list <Application ID>   List application attempts for aplication.
fields.summary: Spelling mistake in the help message of "yarn applicationattempt" command

comments.body: I do see several places having such typo, changes is trivial, just submitted a patch to fix this.
